DOC.brief_summary: This protocol describes a randomized, two arm clinical trial comparing two topical treatments in patients with hypergranulation tissue at gastrostomy tube sites. The subjects are randomized to either group 1or group 2 treatments: Maximum duration of therapy is 4 weeks. However, the therapy may be discontinued anytime at the discretion of the investigator or if there is resolution of the of the hypergranulation tissue.
DOC.brief_title: Silver Nitrate Application and Topical Corticosteroids for Hypergranulation Tissue
DOC.criteria: 1. Pediatric patients <18 2. Evaluated for hypergranulation at the Gtube site 3. Inpatient and outpatient Children not meeting the above criteia
